scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:clients" "npm run dev:host"
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:clients
scripts.build:all: npm run build:ui && npm run build:auth && npm run build:clients && npm run build:host
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/auth && npm install && cd ../clients && npm install && cd ../host && npm install && cd ../../libs/ui && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:auth && npm run lint:clients && npm run lint:host
scripts.test: npm run test:auth && npm run test:clients && npm run test:host
